repository.corpname: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

physdesc.extent: Printed matter, contracts, photos, truck models - 4 cartons

did.abstract: This collection contains materials collected by Laird Evans over the course of his career as a Teamster.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged by subject.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please cite unpublished materials in the following way:
Please provide the title and date of item, catalog number (if applicable it will be found written on the folder), name of the collection, name of the repository, and location of the repository.

Example: James Oglethorpe to the Trustees, 13 January 1876, RG0001 Series 1, Box 4, Folder 3. Records of the Board of Trustees, Special Collections Research Center, Gelman Library, The George Washington University, Washington, D.C.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material may be copyrighted or restricted. It is the patron's obligation to determine and satisfy copyright or other case restrictions when publishing or otherwise distributing materials found in the collections.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains materials collected by Laird Evans. Materials include IBT publications, materials from IBT Local 568, materials relating to Laird Evan's book "And Justice For All...Even Teamsters."

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Laird Evans worked as a Business Agent and Secretary/Treasurer for Local 568 in Shreveport, Louisiana for almost 30 years. He is the author of "And Justice For All...Even Teamsters!"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series consists of truck models collected by Laird Evans. These trucks represent some of the companies the Teamsters have worked with. The trucks are in varying conditions.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Models in this series are arranged by box. There is no particular order to the models in the boxes.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This box contains truck models collected by Laird Evans. Models in this box consist of: Churchill Truck Lines, inc trailer (2 trailers), Preston People trailer, ABF truck (2 trucks), P.I.E. trucks (3 trucks, all different versions), Roadway express, inc trucks (5 trucks, all different versions), and Consolidated Freightways trucks (4 trucks).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This box contains truck models collected by Laird Evans. Models in this box consist of: Ryder P.I.E. truck, Transcon trailer, GF Consolidated Freightweighters truck, McLean Trucking Company truck, Mopac Moyer Packing Company truck, ABF truck, and a large United Parcel Service truck.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This box contains truck models collected by Laird Evans. Models in this box consist of: Gordon Transports, Inc truck, UBC large truck without trailer, Steve D. Thompson Trucking, inc truck, Campbell Express truck, Graves ANR freight system truck, Lee Way truck, Roadway Express, inc truck, TIME-DC truck, Churchill Truck Lines, inc truck without trailer, McLean Trucking Company trucks (2 trucks), and a AG Kits, Toys, Collectibles, and Die Cast Metal Replicas car model.
